net.tmachine.gpg4.gameserver
Class PlainWritableSelectorHandler

java.lang.Object
  net.tmachine.gpg4.gameserver.GatheringWritableSelectorHandler
      net.tmachine.gpg4.gameserver.PlainWritableSelectorHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
iResponseWriter, iSelectorHandler, iWritableSelectorHandler, java.lang.Runnable
public class PlainWritableSelectorHandler
extends GatheringWritableSelectorHandler

Exactly the same as GatheringWritableSelectorHandler, except that it doesn't use Gathering writes (because of a bug in JDK 1.4.2 which makes gathering writes VERY VERY slow with more than 20 or so buffers).

This module seems to be faster than 1.4.2 gathering writes in all situations!

It only overrides one method from GatheringWritableSelectorHandler: processWritableKey(...)

See Also:
GatheringWritableSelectorHandler
